mapper.select: SELECT t.id id, t.start_date startDate, t.rate_half_year rateHalfYear, t.rate_one_year rateOneYear, t.rate_three_year rateThreeYear, t.rate_five_year rateFiveYear, t.rate_over_five_year rateOverFiveYear, t.create_time createTime, t.update_time updateTime, t.creator creator, t.updater updater, t.deleted deleted, t.tenant_id tenantId FROM biz_calc_interest_rate_data t ORDER BY t.start_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_calc_exec_data ( id, process_id, rate_id, date_index, day_rate, day_amount ) VALUES ( #{id},#{processId},#{rateId},#{dateIndex},#{dayRate},#{dayAmount} )
mapper.select: SELECT min(a.date_index) AS startDate, max(a.date_index) AS endDate, round(a.day_rate * 100,5) suiteRate, c.days AS days, ROUND(SUM(day_amount),2) AS sectionAmount FROM biz_calc_exec_data a LEFT JOIN biz_calc_interest_rate_data b ON a.rate_id = b.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT process_id ,COUNT(1) days,rate_id FROM biz_calc_exec_data WHERE process_id = #{processId} GROUP BY rate_id ) c ON a.process_id = c.process_id AND a.rate_id = c.rate_id WHERE a.process_id = #{processId} GROUP BY a.rate_id ORDER BY a.date_index

SELECT min(a.date_index) startDate, max(a.date_index) endDate, round(a.day_rate*100,5) suiteRate, c.days AS days, ROUND(SUM(day_amount),2) AS sectionAmount FROM biz_calc_exec_data a LEFT JOIN biz_calc_interest_rate_data b ON a.rate_id = b.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT process_id ,COUNT(1) days,rate_id FROM biz_calc_exec_data WHERE process_id = #{processId} GROUP BY rate_id ,day_rate ) c ON a.process_id = c.process_id AND a.rate_id = c.rate_id WHERE a.process_id = #{processId} GROUP BY a.rate_id , a.day_rate ORDER BY b.start_date

SELECT min(a.date_index) startDate, max(a.date_index) endDate, round(a.day_rate*100,5) suiteRate, c.days AS days, ROUND(SUM(day_amount),2) AS sectionAmount FROM biz_calc_exec_data a LEFT JOIN biz_calc_interest_rate_data b ON a.rate_id = b.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT process_id ,COUNT(1) days,rate_id,day_rate FROM biz_calc_exec_data WHERE process_id = #{processId} GROUP BY rate_id ,day_rate ) c ON a.process_id = c.process_id AND a.rate_id = c.rate_id and a.day_rate = c.day_rate WHERE a.process_id = #{processId} GROUP BY a.rate_id , a.day_rate ORDER BY b.start_date

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.date_index,'%Y-%m') startDate, '' endDate, a.day_rate suiteRate, c.days AS days, ROUND(SUM(day_amount),2) AS sectionAmount FROM biz_calc_exec_data a LEFT JOIN biz_calc_interest_rate_data b ON a.rate_id = b.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT process_id ,COUNT(1) days,DATE_FORMAT( date_index,'%Y-%m') monthIndex FROM biz_calc_exec_data WHERE process_id = #{processId} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(date_index,'%Y-%m') ) c ON a.process_id = c.process_id AND DATE_FORMAT(a.date_index,'%Y-%m') = c.monthIndex WHERE a.process_id = #{processId} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.date_index,'%Y-%m')
SELECT ROUND(SUM(day_amount),2) FROM biz_calc_exec_data WHERE process_id = #{processId}
